Author: McFadden, Freida
Review: I LOVE IT! yes yes yes, Frieda McFadden wrote a short Christmas novella that I can read in an hour... awesome!!! Where does she get her ideas? I need more...

Author: Fitzpatrick, Becca
Review: I think that such books are not for me. It took me a long time to force myself to read to the end :/

Author: Meyer, Stephenie
Review: uhhh, the atmosphere between the main characters seems so strange! This created world is definitely not for me, but it's not the worst book I've read either

Author: King, Stephen
Review: good, good and good again, but not the best!

Author: King, Stephen
Review: I love this book! The suspense, the mystery, the twists and turns. It's brilliant! I want and need more

Author: Jackson, Holly
Book title: As Good As Dead (A Good Girl's Guide to Murder, #3)
Review: It's a good thing I managed to finish it. I guess I just wasted my time in the end.

Author: Jackson, Holly
Book title: A Good Girl's Guide to Murder (A Good Girl's Guide to Murder, #1)
Review: I don't know how I managed to read this to the end. I guess it's just my will to fight. However, I will read the sequel.
